name: Super (Strange) Mario Bros.
description:
DISCLAIMER I DO NOT OWN NINTENDO OR MARIO! THIS IS JUST A FAN-PROJECT MADE FOR THE FUN OF IT!

Aside from that, this is a poorly-coded (on purpose ;D) Mario Bros. fangame.

The "E" stands for "END,"

I spelt world wrong on purpose. ;D

There might be more levels and stuff soon.

Maybe.

Perhaps.

Some day.

Possibly.
